title: 10/27: Week 8 Recap - Fantasy Points Galore! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
It was a high-scoring week and we start the show with The Best of Week 8 (2:00)! Is Daniel Jones worth keeping after this big game? Is Tevin Coleman a stud going forward? What role will Latavius Murray have? And how about some of these streaming TE options! We also go over the big news (14:55) as Brandin Cooks and Chase Edmonds are among the injured and take an early look at the Waiver Wire (17:44). Anyone interested in a Lions RB? ... Winners (24:00) like Ryan Tannehill and Joe Mixon and Losers (30:25) like Zach Ertz and Larry Fitzgerald. And we've got the Worryometer (35:00) for Le'Veon Bell, Keenan Allen and Odell Beckham ... Recapping every game (41:00) with a "Believe it or Not" from Heath as we discuss the Chargers RBs, players to buy and players to sell and much, much more ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Your Week 8 recap with the best and worst performances and an early look at the Waiver Wire.
